extension.description: A collection of Add-ons which focus on specific YouYube channels sorted by topic.[CR]You will need a personal YouTube api key from Google, entered into the Youtube add-on which will work on all the add-ons.[CR]Instruction video:[CR]https://youtu.be/N18czV5tj5o

extension.summary: Channels and playlists organised by categories using YouTube only.
extension.description: Xtasy D is a mix bag of one click playlists for all!
extension.disclaimer: The author is not responsible for the use of this addon. The author is not responsible for the content found using this addon. The author does not host or own any content found within this addon.[CR]The author is in no way affiliated with Kodi, Team Kodi, or the XBMC Foundation.[CR]This is a Non-profit resource, organized solely for educational purposes which is protected under the Fair-Use doctrine of the Copyright Act, Specifically section 107, which does promote freedom of expression, by permitting the unlicensed use of copyright-protected works.

extension.description: Hasta las narices de las apikeys de YouTube? Y de ver como calidad máxima los videos de la plataforma solo hasta 720p?[CR]Pues se acabó! Desde nuestra taberna os presentamos un nuevo addon de YouTube, donde no hace falta APIKEY alguna, ni tampoco hay ningún tipo de restricción para ver los videos a la máxima calidad ofrecida, 720p, 1080p, 2K y 4K![CR]Todo esto y mucho mas...

Tired of dealing with YouTube/Google api keys and only able to see the videos on the platform up to 720p?[CR]Well, that's over! From our team we present a new YouTube addon, where NO API KEY is needed, no logging in, nor are there any kind of restrictions to watch the videos at the highest quality offered (720p, 1080p, 2K and 4K!)[CR]All this and much more more...
extension.disclaimer: Este es un software [COLOR red][B]gratuito[/B][/COLOR][CR][COLOR red][B]Pero no se permite[/B][/COLOR] su distribuición preinstalada en ningún tipo de dispositivo ni tampoco su inclusión total o parcial en cualquier paquete de software y/o hardware por el que el usuario final deba [COLOR red][B]pagar o hacer una donación[/B][/COLOR], por su adquisición, por su uso o por recibir asistencia.[CR]Si cree que alguna de estas normas no se está cumpliendo póngase en contacto con nosotros.

This add-on is offered as [COLOR red][B]free[/B][/COLOR][CR][COLOR red][B]software! It is not allowed[/B][/COLOR] to be distributed or pre-installed on any type of device including in other software and/or hardware package for which the end user must [COLOR red][B]pay or make a donation[/B][/COLOR], for its acquisition, for its use or for receiving assistance.[CR]It must be redistributed for free. If you believe that any of these rules is not being followed, please contact us.

extension.description: YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
YouTube je jedna z největších webových stránek světa sdílející video.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.
YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
YouTube es uno de los sitios web más grande del mundo para compartir vídeos.
YouTube es uno de los más grandes sitios web de intercambio de videos del mundo.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
YouTube הוא אחד מאתרי שיתוף הווידאו הגדולים בעולם.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube è uno dei più grandi siti web di condivisione video del mondo.
유튜브는 세상에서 가장 큰 동영상 공유 사이트 중의 하나입니다.
YouTube er en av verdens største nettsider for videodeling.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
YouTube - популярнейший видеохостинговый сайт, предоставляющий пользователям услуги хранения, доставки и показа видео.
YouTube, dünya üzerindeki en büyük video paylaşma platformlarından birisidir.
YouTube là một trong những trang web chia sẻ video lớn nhất trên thế giới.
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
